meanings.definition: The state or quality of being squishy.
meanings.sent1: The squishinesses of the marshmallows made them perfect for toasting over the campfire.
meanings.sent2: I love the squishinesses of my favorite pillow.
meanings.sent3: The toddler giggled as he played with the squishinesses of the playdough.
meanings.sent4: Her heart melted at the squishinesses of the puppy's fur.
meanings.sent5: The squishinesses of the ripe peach made it irresistible to bite into.

meanings.definition: The act of squishing or squeezing something soft.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the satisfying squishinesses of squeezing stress balls.
meanings.sent2: The squishinesses of the mud between his toes made him smile.
meanings.sent3: The children had a blast with the squishinesses of the slime at the birthday party.
meanings.sent4: The squishinesses of the grapes underfoot made a delightful popping sound.
meanings.sent5: He couldn't resist the squishinesses of the foam stress toy on his desk.

meanings.definition: The feeling of being soft and yielding when pressed.
meanings.sent1: The squishinesses of the ripe avocado indicated it was ready to eat.
meanings.sent2: She loved the squishinesses of the memory foam mattress.
meanings.sent3: The squishinesses of the marshmallows made them perfect for roasting.
meanings.sent4: The squishinesses of the sponge soaked up the spilled milk quickly.
meanings.sent5: The squishinesses of the ripe peach hinted at its juicy sweetness.
